text: aur kaafiro ne kaha ke hum hargiz na to is Qurâ€™aan ko maane, na is se pehle ki kitaabo ko! aye dekhne waale kaash ke tu un zaalimo ko us waqth dekhta jab ke ye apne rab ke saamne khade hoye ek dosre ko ilzaam de rahe honge, kamzoor log bade logo se kahenge, agar tum na hote to hum to momin hote
